Descriptor.Name: Heat of formation of phenoxyl radicals as Hfr/10
Heat of formation of the corresponding parent phenol as Hfp/10
Difference of heats of formation between phenoxyl radicals and the corresponding parent phenols as DeltaHf/10
Number of hydroxyl groups
Descriptor.Description: E7: excluding one hydroxyl group for each phenolic compound TEAC: number of free phenolic OH groups (excluding OH groups on sugars)

Descriptor.Name: Energy of the lowest unoccupied molecular orbital of the radical
Descriptor.Description: Elumo values of the corresponding radicals of antioxidants were calculated using radicals obtained by substraction of a hydrogen atom from the proper phenolic hydroxyl group.

Descriptor.Name: Energy of the highest occupied molecular orbital
Indicator variable
Descriptor.Description: indicator variable (I) - presence (I = 1) or absence (I = 0) of the 2,3-double bond
